sentences.en: Because each minute with your love is priceless bestow from God.
sentences.cn: 因为与?们相处的每分每秒都是上帝最无价的恩赐.

sentences.en: Bless us and bestow miracles upon us!
sentences.cn: 赐福于我们,降下那奇迹吧!

sentences.en: Bows crossbows, and slings bestow the bonus damage upon their ammunition.
sentences.cn: 弓 、 和投石器将对伤害的加值施加于其弹药上.

sentences.en: Bows crossbows, and slings bestow the energy upon their ammunition.
sentences.cn: 弓 、 和投石器将此能量施加于其弹药上.

sentences.en: honours bestowed on him by the Queen
I bestow my own attributes over liberally on him.
sentences.cn: 我把自己的特性慷慨地施与他了.

sentences.en: In those days she valued her affection too highly to bestow it casually.
sentences.cn: 那时苏小姐把自己的爱情看得太名贵了,不肯随便施与.

sentences.en: Learn how to acknowledge and bestow praise.
sentences.cn: 更要学会认可和给予赞美.

sentences.en: Many people despise wealth, but few know how to bestow it.
sentences.cn: 鄙视财富大有人在, 使用财富却鲜有人知.

sentences.en: Open, Gates of heaven. Bless us and bestow miracles upon us!
sentences.cn: 开启吧.天国之门. 赐福于我们,降下那奇迹吧!

sentences.en: She had helped Mr. Gryce to bestow his encumbering properties beneath the table.
sentences.cn: 她帮着古莱斯先生把他那些乱堆着的提包安置在桌子底下.

sentences.en: She received every honour that the scientific world could bestow.
sentences.cn: 她获得了科学界所能授予的一切荣誉.

sentences.en: Some critics of books bestow their praise or their censure by wholesale.
sentences.cn: 某些书的批评家不辨好恶地随便褒贬.

sentences.en: The greatest honor history can bestow is the title of peacemaker.
sentences.cn: 历史所能颁赐的最大荣耀,就是和平缔造者这个头衔.

sentences.en: The United States bestowed honorary citizenship upon England's World War II prime minister, Sir Winston Churchill.
sentences.cn: 美国授予了二战期间的英国首相温斯顿·丘吉尔爵士荣誉公民的称号。

sentences.en: What great inspiration wiII you bestow on me?
sentences.cn: 你有什么伟大的灵感能馈赠给我?

sentences.en: You promised to bestow on me the friendly affection of a brother.
sentences.cn: 你答应过要给与我热烈的兄妹之爱.

trans.tran_en: to give someone something of great value or importance

trans.tran_cn: 赠给，授予，放置，安置，贮藏，〈口〉给…提供住宿，让…留宿
trans.tran_en: to give someone something of great value or importance
